击败古代守卫

搜集到所有颜色的恐鸟蛋

advancement.ancient_aether.valkyrum_armo:
制作一套女武神金属盔甲

ancient_aether.ancient_treasure_chest_lo: 这个宝藏箱必须使用古代钥匙解锁
ancient_aether.laboratory_treasure_chest: 这个宝藏箱必须使用实验室钥匙解锁
block.ancient_aether.highsproot_hanging_: 悬挂式天根蓝木告示牌
block.ancient_aether.sakura_hanging_sign: 悬挂式天境樱花木告示牌
config.ancient_aether.client.gui.custom_: Gives Ancient Aether Bosses custom boss bar designs
config.ancient_aether.client.gui.the_aet: Changes the title in the Ancient Aether Title Screen to: The Aether
config.ancient_aether.client.gui.title_s: Changes the Title Screen to the Ancient Aether Theme on start-up
config.ancient_aether.client.modpack.con: Allows Ancient Aether to override Config default values, should not be disabled normally
config.ancient_aether.client.tooltips.du: Displays what mob is summoned by Trapped Dungeon Blocks as well as what boss is required to unlock Boss Doorway Blocks on the item
config.ancient_aether.client.tooltips.mo: Displays the Moas Mid-Air Jumps and Speed as a tooltip on the egg
config.ancient_aether.client.tooltips.ra: Gives Aether Dungeon Loot a certain rarity in form of a tooltip
config.ancient_aether.common.experimenta: Enables features of the mod that are work in progress
config.ancient_aether.common.gameplay.wi: The duration of how long Wind Blows fired by Wind Blowers last in ticks
config.ancient_aether.common.worldgen.an: The weighting of Ancient Aether Regions in the Aether
config.ancient_aether.server.modpack.ser: Allows Ancient Aether to override Server Config default values, should not be disabled normally
在使用神眷工具时获得的一种保护效果
effect.ancient_aether.natures_boost.desc: 令玩家的足迹具有肥沃土地的功效
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogel_glass: A clearer version of Aerogel crafted from 8 pieces of Aerogel and one planks in the middle. It can be crafted into all kinds of variants. Unlike regular glass, it doesn't break when mined. Mining it also doesn't require a pickaxe.
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogel_glass_: 由气凝胶玻璃制成的装饰块。
由气凝胶玻璃制成的装饰块。与普通玻璃板不同，当挖掘时不会破裂。挖掘它也不需要十字镐。
由气凝胶玻璃制成的装饰块。
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogetic_slab: 由气凝石制作。台阶块，用于装饰和创建光滑的斜坡。尝试将其添加到建筑的屋顶！
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogetic_stai: 由气凝石制作。楼梯对于建筑增加垂直度很有用，也经常用于装饰！
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogetic_ston: 在古代地牢中发现的石头。这种石头呈深色金属般的颜色，可以作为装饰方块挖掘。
一种花哨的气凝石变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogetic_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Aerogetic Stone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.aerogetic_wall: 由气凝石制作。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！
lore.block.ancient_aether.aeronautic_sto: The light version of Aerogetic Stone. It is less common than Aerogetic Stone, but it looks really nice as a decorative block.
lore.block.ancient_aether.aether_quartz_: 天境中石英的来源矿石。
lore.block.ancient_aether.ambrosium_camp: 在天境中起作用的篝火。如果你没有太多神能晶片，这是一个不错的熔炉替代品。
lore.block.ancient_aether.ambrosium_lant: A decoration block that is crafted from Holystone, Skyroot Sticks and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern works in the Aether unlike its Overworld counterpart.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_aeroge: A dusty relic found in Ancient Dungeons. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_angeli: A dusty relic found in Silver Dungeons. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_frozen: A frosted relic found in Sentry Laboratories. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_gale_v: A dusty relic found in Platinum Dungeons. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_hellfi: A dusty relic found in Gold Dungeons. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_holyst: A dusty relic found in Holystone Ruins. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_mossy_: An overgrown relic found in Mysterious Henges. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_obelis: 一种精致的装饰方块，只能用重力晶镐或更好的镐挖掘。
lore.block.ancient_aether.ancient_sentry: A dusty relic found in Bronze Dungeons. Breaking it can yield you some shiny treasures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.angelic_corner: A variant of Angelic Stone. Due to its unique texture you can rotate it to create a quite interesting wall patterns for your builds.
lore.block.ancient_aether.angelic_stone_: 一种花哨的天灵石变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.angelic_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Angelic Stone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.atmosine_cryst: A shiny crystal that floats upwards similarly to Gravitite and is good fuel supplier for the Altar.
lore.block.ancient_aether.carved_stone_m: 一种花哨的雕纹石变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.carved_tile_sl: Crafted from Carved Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.ancient_aether.carved_tile_st: Crafted from Carved Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.ancient_aether.carved_tile_wa: Crafted from Carved Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.ancient_aether.carved_tiles: A variant of Carved Stone that can be used as a decoration block. It also generates in Bronze Dungeons, primarily as an accent block to regular Carved Stone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.corrupted_aero: A spooky variant of Aeronautic Stone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.crystal_skyroo: 这些叶子与天根蓝树一起生成。腐烂时会掉落天根蓝树苗和白苹果
这些天根蓝树苗会长成天根蓝树。使用骨粉可以让它们长得更快。
lore.block.ancient_aether.elevetia: These mysterious flowers can be found in large numbers in Elevated Islands. They can be crafted into Purple Dye when placed in a Crafting Table.
lore.block.ancient_aether.enchanted_skyr: 这些叶子与施魔天根树一起生成。它们在凋落时可能掉落施魔天根树苗。
这些小蓝树苗将长成天根树的变种，施魔天根树。它们可以用骨粉快速生长。
lore.block.ancient_aether.fluffalo_carpe: 由霜绒紫犎毛制成的舒适装饰块。
lore.block.ancient_aether.fluffalo_wool: 从霜绒紫犎身上获得的非常厚的毛。其密度使其不易燃烧，使其成为理想的屋顶砖块。
lore.block.ancient_aether.frozen_holysto: A piece of pottery crafted by freezing regular Holystone Vases.
lore.block.ancient_aether.gale_stone_mos: 一种花哨的飓风石变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.gale_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Gale Stone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.gravity_gravel: Stepping on this block increases your jump height. It generates on the coasts of Elevated Islands and doesn't fall unlike its Overworld counterpart.
lore.block.ancient_aether.hellfire_stone: 一种花哨的狱炎石变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.hellfire_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Hellfire Stone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_boo: Crafted from Highsproot Planks and Books. Bookshelves can be used to enhance the enchanting capabilities of an Enchanting Table.
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_but: 由天根蓝木板制作，用于激活机制和红石的按钮。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_doo: 由天根蓝木板制作，一扇装饰门，有助于在不担心怪物游荡的情况下保持封闭和安全的空间。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_fen: 由天根蓝木板和木棍制作。非常适合让你的牲畜远离游荡的捕食者！
由木棍和天根蓝木板制作。为你珍贵的围栏提供温馨的入口和出口。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_han: Crafted from Stripped Highsproot Logs and Chains. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_lea: 这些叶子与天根蓝树一起生成。在腐烂时可能掉落天根蓝树苗。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_log: 在大多数天境地区都可以找到的树木的原木，尤其是在非常寒冷的温风地区。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天根蓝木板。
由天根蓝原木制成。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_pla: 天根蓝木板可以制作成各种工具、方块和物品。它们由天根蓝原木制成，是一种出色的建筑材料。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_pre: 由天根蓝木板制作。用于激活机制和红石的木质压力板。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_sap: 这些小巧的蓝色树苗将长成天根蓝树。可以用骨粉更快地生长。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_sig: 由天根蓝木板和天根木棍制作。一个有用的牌子，非常适合写上消息和方向。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_sla: 由天根蓝木板制作。台阶块，用于装饰和创建光滑的斜坡。尝试将其添加到建筑的屋顶！
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_sta: 由天根蓝木板制作。楼梯对于建筑增加垂直度很有用，也经常用于装饰！
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_tra: 由天根蓝木板制作。可以用来封堵一个方块大小的入口的活板门。通常用于额外保护楼梯。
lore.block.ancient_aether.highsproot_woo: 由天根蓝原木制成的建筑方块。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天根蓝木板。
由天根蓝木制成。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.holystone_bric: 一种花哨的圣石砖块变体，可以在各种不同的方向旋转。
lore.block.ancient_aether.holystone_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Holystone Bricks in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.mossy_holyston: A piece of pottery crafted from Mossy Holystone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.powered_obelis: A futuristic decoration block that can only be mined with a Gravitite Pickaxe or higher.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_bookshe: Crafted from Sakura Planks and Books. Bookshelves can be used to enhance the enchanting capabilities of an Enchanting Table.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_button: 由天境樱花木板制作，用于激活机制和红石的按钮。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_door: 由天境樱花木板制作，一扇装饰门，有助于在不担心怪物游荡的情况下保持封闭和安全的空间。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_fence: 由天境樱花木板和木棍制作。非常适合让你的牲畜远离游荡的捕食者！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_fence_g: 由木棍和天境樱花木板制作。为你珍贵的围栏提供温馨的入口和出口。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_hanging: Crafted from Stripped Sakura Logs and Chains. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_leaves: 这些叶子与天境樱花树一起生成。在腐烂时可能掉落天境樱花树苗。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_log: 在天境的一种稀有生态，天境樱花丛林中发现的树木原木。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天境樱花木板。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_log_wal: 由天境樱花原木制作。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_planks: 天境樱花木板可以制作成各种工具、方块和物品。它们由天境樱花原木制作，是一种出色的建筑材料。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_pressur: 由天境樱花木板制作。用于激活机制和红石的木质压力板。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_sapling: 这些小巧的粉色树苗将长成巨大的天境樱花树。可以用骨粉更快地生长。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_sign: 由天境樱花木板和天根木棍制作。一个有用的牌子，非常适合写上消息和方向。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_slab: 由天境樱花木板制作。台阶块，用于装饰和创建光滑的斜坡。尝试将其添加到建筑的屋顶！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_stairs: 由天境樱花木板制作。楼梯对于建筑增加垂直度很有用，也经常用于装饰！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_trapdoo: 由天境樱花木板制作。可以用来封堵一个方块大小的入口的活板门。通常用于额外保护楼梯。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_wood: 由天境樱花原木制作的建筑方块。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天境樱花木板。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_wood_wa: 由天境樱花木制作。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sentry_vase: A piece of pottery crafted from Carved Stone in a Stonecutter.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sky_blues: 有时可以在寒冷的温风地区找到的一种花朵。将其放入工作台中可制成青色染料，并用于喂食高地水牛。
lore.block.ancient_aether.sky_grass: The main grass type of the Aether. It can come in different lengths and colors depending on its surroundings.
lore.block.ancient_aether.skyroot_pine_l: 这些叶子与天根松树一起生成。腐烂后会掉落天根松树苗。
lore.block.ancient_aether.skyroot_pine_s: 这些小树苗会长成天根松树。使用骨粉可以让它们长得更快。
lore.block.ancient_aether.slider_prototy: A failed experiment of the Ancient Valkyries that can only be mined with a Gravitite Pickaxes or higher. Activating it with Redstone might have spooky consequences.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_highs: 使用斧头去皮的天根蓝原木。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天根蓝木板。
由去皮天根蓝原木制成。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
由去皮天根蓝原木制成的建筑方块。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天根蓝木板。
由去皮天根蓝木制成。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_sakur: 使用斧头去皮的天境樱花原木。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天境樱花木板。
由去皮天境樱花原木制作。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
由去皮天境樱花原木制作的建筑方块。放入工作台中时，它们会提供4个天境樱花木板。
由去皮天境樱花木制作。可用于装饰性围栏和防御。防止讨厌的侵入者！也非常适用于创建自定义树木！
lore.block.ancient_aether.sun_lantern: A fancy lantern found in Gold Dungeons. It can also be crafted using an Ambrosium Lantern and a piece of Light Hellfire Stone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sunset_rose: These small flowers can be found in large numbers all around the Aether. They can be crafted into Red Dye when placed in a Crafting Table.
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrie_brick: Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Valkyrie Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
The result from smelting Valkyrie Clay after crafting it together. These pristine bricks make for a nice building material that can crafted into several variants.
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrie_clay: The Aether's equivalent of clay. It can be found in shallow areas of Sky Lakes
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrie_tile_: Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Valkyrie Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defenses. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrie_tiles: A variant of Valkyrie Bricks that works nicely as a shiny floor block.
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrum_block: 由女武神金属压缩而成的块。它们可以为信标提供能量，并具有高贵的外观。
lore.block.ancient_aether.valkyrum_ore: 一种非常稀有的矿石，只能使用神眷之镐或更高级别的工具开采。可以在祭坛上将其附魔成女武神矿。
lore.block.ancient_aether.violet_aerclou: 靠近地面的一片紫色云。这个境云与天蓝境云相反，因为它将玩家和其他实体向下推。
lore.block.ancient_aether.wind_blower: A way of transmitting Redstone Signals in the Aether. Activating one makes it release a Wind Blow that would activate another one if it gets hit, which causes a chain reaction. If a Windblower is active, it will emit a Redstone Signal. It can also be worn on your head if you want to look extra fancy.
lore.block.ancient_aether.wynd_ice: A block that behaves similar to Packed Ice and can be found on the coasts of Wyndcap Islands.
lore.block.ancient_aether.wynd_lantern: A dim lantern found in Sentry Laboratories. It can also be crafted using an Ambrosium Lantern and a piece of Wynd Sentry Stone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.wynd_sentry_st: A rare Sentry Stone variant exclusive to the Sentry Laboratory. It emits a dimmer light than regular Sentry Stone and can also be made in the Freezer.
lore.block.ancient_aether.wynd_thistle: 在整个寒冷的温风地区生成的一种尖刺花朵。将其放入工作台中可制成淡蓝色染料，并用于喂食高地水牛。
lore.item.ancient_aether.aeronautic_dart: A reward from defeating the Ancient Dungeon Boss. This dart shooter launches mobs high up in the air similar to Gravitite Equipment. You can use any type of dart as ammunition.
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_armor_t: A stylish upgrade for your armor, gained by defeating the Ancient Dungeon Boss.
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_dungeon: A key shimmering in an ancient blue. It is dropped by the Ancient Dungeon's Final Boss and is used to unlock the Ancient Treasure Chest!
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_pendant: 击败古代守卫的奖励。这个吊坠可以增加0.2的攻击速度。
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_ring: 击败古代守卫的奖励。这个戒指可以增加0.1的攻击速度。
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_rune: 在岗哨实验室中发现的符文，是古代地牢的关键，因为它解锁了损坏的岗哨方尖碑。还可以使用7个神炼重力晶矿和1个古代岗哨石复制。
lore.item.ancient_aether.ancient_sword: 这把剑是击败古代守卫的奖励。由于其高攻击速度，它非常强大。
lore.item.ancient_aether.ascended_armor_: A stylish upgrade for your armor, rarely found in vases and dungeon chests.
lore.item.ancient_aether.burgundy_moa_eg: An egg laid by a Burgundy Moa. Hatching this provides a Burgundy Moa with 10 mid-air jumps.
lore.item.ancient_aether.divine_axe: 击败武神女王所得战利品之一，这个斧子会在使用时为你提供额外的保护，破坏更多方块会延长效果持续时间
lore.item.ancient_aether.divine_hoe: 击败武神女王所得战利品之一， 这个锄头会在使用时为你提供额外的保护，破坏更多方块会延长效果持续时间
lore.item.ancient_aether.divine_pickaxe: 击败武神女王所得战利品之一，这个镐子足以挖掘女武神金属矿石并且会在使用时为你提供额外的保护，破坏更多方块会延长效果持续时间
lore.item.ancient_aether.divine_shovel: 击败武神女王所得战利品之一，这个铲子会在使用时为你提供额外的保护，破坏更多方块会延长效果持续时间
lore.item.ancient_aether.festive_gummy_s: A sweet-smelling gummy, it can be found in random chests in Sentry Laboratories. It fully restores the player's hunger when eaten. Very useful for boss fights.
lore.item.ancient_aether.grapes: 它们有时可以在女武神定居点的田野上找到，因为这是女武神最喜欢的水果。可以用来制作女武神葡萄酒。
lore.item.ancient_aether.growth_pendant: A reward from defeating the Valkyrie Queen. This pendant grants you +2 Max Health.
lore.item.ancient_aether.growth_ring: A reward from defeating the Valkyrie Queen. This ring grants you +1 Max Health.
lore.item.ancient_aether.hermes_pendant: A reward from defeating Dungeons. This pendant increases your total Movement Speed by +5%.
lore.item.ancient_aether.hermes_ring: A reward from defeating Dungeons. This ring increases your total Movement Speed by +3%.
lore.item.ancient_aether.highsproot_boat: 虽然天境没有很多大型水域，但船在穿越冰面上的大距离时偶尔会是一个有用的工具！
lore.item.ancient_aether.highsproot_ches: 在后部带有方便的储物箱的天根蓝木船。在穿越天境中著名的难以找到的长距离水域时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.laboratory_dung: Obtained from the Mutated Aechor Plant, the final boss of the Sentry Laboratory, this frozen key can be used to unlock the treasure this lab beholds.
lore.item.ancient_aether.lavender_moa_eg: An egg laid by a Lavender Moa. Hatching this provides a Lavender Moa with 3 mid-air jumps. These moas have been given a very fast a flying speed as a compensation.
lore.item.ancient_aether.mechanical_armo: A stylish upgrade for your armor, gained by defeating the Mutated Aechor Plant.
lore.item.ancient_aether.mosaic_armor_tr: A stylish upgrade for your armor, gained by defeating the Slider.
lore.item.ancient_aether.mysterious_armo: A stylish upgrade for your armor, rarely found in Mysterious Henges.
lore.item.ancient_aether.pink_cape: An extravagant Cape, crafted from Pink Wool.
lore.item.ancient_aether.royal_armor_tri: A stylish upgrade for your armor, gained by defeating the Valkyrie Queen.
lore.item.ancient_aether.sakura_boat: 虽然天境没有很多大型水域，但船在穿越冰面上的大距离时偶尔会是一个有用的工具！
lore.item.ancient_aether.sakura_chest_bo: 在后部带有方便的储物箱的天境樱花木船。在穿越天境中著名的难以找到的长距离水域时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.sakura_moa_egg: 一枚非常罕见的恐鸟蛋，只能在古代地牢的箱子中找到。孵化后可以获得一只带有10次空中跳跃的天境樱花恐鸟。
lore.item.ancient_aether.shield_of_inebr: A reward from defeating the Mutated Aechor Plant. This shield has a 50% change to give attackers Inebriation.
lore.item.ancient_aether.shield_of_remed: A reward from defeating the Mutated Aechor Plant. This shield makes you immune to Inebriation.
lore.item.ancient_aether.sky_blue_moa_eg: An egg laid by a Sky Blue Moa. Hatching this provides a Sky Blue Moa with 5 mid-air jumps and a faster flying speed.
lore.item.ancient_aether.slammberry: This berry, obtained from defeating the mischievous Slammroots, launches you high up in the air and then proceeds to spread vegetation once you land again.
lore.item.ancient_aether.solar_armor_tri: A stylish upgrade for your armor, gained by defeating the Sun Spirit.
lore.item.ancient_aether.strength_stone: 击败古代守卫的奖励。这颗宝石可以增加1.25倍的伤害。
lore.item.ancient_aether.teal_moa_egg: An egg laid by a Teal Moa. Hatching this provides a Teal Moa with 6 mid-air jumps and a faster flying speed.
lore.item.ancient_aether.turquoise_moa_e: An egg laid by a Turquoise Moa. Hatching this provides a Turquoise Moa with 7 mid-air jumps.
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrie_brick: A shiny white brick that can be crafted into various different decoration blocks like Valkyrie Bricks or Vases.
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrie_clay_b: Obtained from mining Valkyrie Clay, this item can either be smelted into a Valkyrie Brick or crafted back into a block.
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum: 一种用于锻造最精良武器的闪亮金属。它还可以用作高贵的点缀材料。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_axe: A noble tool forged from Valkyrum. This Axe has a very far reach and very high attack power. You can use this to your advantage, but be warned, the attack cooldown is very high
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_boots: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵盔甲。当完全穿戴时，你将获得短暂的飞行能力。在到达高处时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_chestp: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵盔甲。当完全穿戴时，你将获得短暂的飞行能力。在到达高处时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_gloves: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵臂套。手套是完成盔甲套装所需的，可以提供短暂的飞行能力。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_helmet: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵盔甲。当完全穿戴时，你将获得短暂的飞行能力。在到达高处时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_hoe: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵工具。这把锄头的作用范围非常远，让你可以在安全距离内无意义地耕地。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_lance: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵武器。这把远程武器非常适合打败西风和女武神女王。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_leggin: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵盔甲。当完全穿戴时，你将获得短暂的飞行能力。在到达高处时非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_pendan: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵饰品。这个吊坠使您的攻击距离增加+1格。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_pickax: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵工具。这把镐在挖掘岛屿下方的方块时非常有用，因为它的作用范围非常远，几乎是正常范围的两倍！它在与滑块战斗时也非常有用。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_ring: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵饰品。这枚戒指使您的攻击距离增加+0.5格。
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_shovel: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵工具。这把铲子可以帮助您以更安全的距离达到快速土壤；相当有用，不是吗？
lore.item.ancient_aether.valkyrum_sword: 一种由女武神金属锻造而成的高贵武器。它的作用范围不如其他瓦尔基里装备，但其更好的攻击伤害和攻击速度使其成为瓦尔基里长矛的有效替代品。
lore.item.ancient_aether.violet_moa_egg: An egg laid by a Violet Moa. Hatching this provides a Violet Moa with 4 mid-air jumps. These moas have been given a very fast a flying speed as a compensation.
lore.item.ancient_aether.warrior_pendant: A reward from defeating Dungeons. This pendant grants you +2 Armor Toughness.
lore.item.ancient_aether.warrior_ring: A reward from defeating Dungeons. This ring grants you +1 Armor Toughness.
lore.item.ancient_aether.whale_armor_tri: A stylish upgrade for your armor, rarely found in vases and dungeon chests.
lore.item.ancient_aether.wynd_armor_trim: A stylish upgrade for your armor, rarely found in vases and dungeon chests.
pack.ancient_aether.programmer_art.title: Ancient Aether Programmer Art
pack.ancient_aether.texture_tweaks.title: Ancient Aether Texture Tweaks
subtitles.ancient_aether.entity.mutated_: 突变箭毒花：发射孢子炸弹
